prompts.name: General
prompts.prompt: Create an image with content: [content], shot type: [shot_type], color theme: [color_theme], lighting: [lighting], and vibe: [vibe].

prompts.name: Portrait/Character Design
prompts.prompt: Create a portrait with subject: [subject], expression: [expression], pose: [pose], clothing: [clothing], background: [background], shot type: [shot_type], color theme: [color_theme], lighting: [lighting], and vibe: [vibe].

prompts.name: Landscape/Environment
prompts.prompt: Create a landscape located at [location] during [time_of_day], season: [season], weather: [weather], with color theme: [color_theme], lighting: [lighting], vibe: [vibe], and composition: [composition].

prompts.name: Product/Marketing Image
prompts.prompt: Create a product image for [product_type] with features: [product_features], background: [background], composition: [composition], color theme: [color_theme], lighting: [lighting], vibe: [vibe], intended for: [intended_use].

prompts.name: Fantasy/Concept Art
prompts.prompt: Create a fantasy scene with description: [scene_description], characters: [characters_present], world style: [world_style], color theme: [color_theme], lighting: [lighting], action: [action_or_event], vibe: [vibe], composition: [composition].

prompts.name: Infographic/Diagram
prompts.prompt: Create an infographic on topic: [topic], data points: [data_points], icon style: [icon_style], layout: [layout], color theme: [color_theme], background: [background], and vibe: [vibe].

prompts.name: Hero's Journey
prompts.prompt: Write a story about a [protagonistRole] who embarks on a journey to find the [object].

prompts.name: Mystery Thriller
prompts.prompt: Describe a [setting] where a detective investigates a [crime] that shocked the town.

prompts.name: Sci-Fi Adventure
prompts.prompt: Outline a tale of a [occupation] traveling through [spacePlace] searching for [item].

prompts.name: Romantic Comedy
prompts.prompt: Write about two [relationship] who meet in a [setting] and face challenges to be together.

prompts.name: Historical Fiction
prompts.prompt: Tell the story of a [historicalFigure] during the [event] and their struggle for freedom.

prompts.name: Array Sort
prompts.prompt: Write a [language] function to sort an array of [datatype] in [order] order.

prompts.name: API Fetch
prompts.prompt: Show how to fetch data from a [apiName] API using [method] requests.

prompts.name: Form Validation
prompts.prompt: Implement form validation for [fieldType] inputs in [language].

prompts.name: Recursive Function
prompts.prompt: Write a recursive [language] function to compute the [operation] of a number.

prompts.name: Database Query
prompts.prompt: Create a [dbType] query to select all records where [condition].

prompts.name: Product Launch
prompts.prompt: Write a catchy tagline for a [productType] that features [featureHighlight].

prompts.name: Social Media Post
prompts.prompt: Create a social media post promoting a [event] happening on [date].

prompts.name: Email Subject
prompts.prompt: Suggest an email subject line to increase open rates for [campaignName].

prompts.name: Brand Story
prompts.prompt: Describe the brand story of a company that values [values] and innovation.

prompts.name: Call to Action
prompts.prompt: Write a call to action encouraging users to [action] on the website.

prompts.name: Math Problem
prompts.prompt: Create a math problem involving the calculation of [operation] of two [units].

prompts.name: History Question
prompts.prompt: Formulate a question about the [event] during the [century].

prompts.name: Science Experiment
prompts.prompt: Explain how to conduct an experiment showing [phenomenon] in [subject].

prompts.name: Language Exercise
prompts.prompt: Design a language exercise focusing on the use of [grammarTopic] in sentences.

prompts.name: Geography Quiz
prompts.prompt: Construct a quiz question related to the [geographicFeature] in [region].
